column1: Uchi////One of the best meals I've had in Houston in awhile. I will preface this by saying it is very expensive. If you are a $24.99 all-you-can-eat sushi type person
column2: this place might not be for you. You have to be willing to dole out some money to get full
column3: but if you are looking for delicious flavors
column6: fresh tasting food...this is a must try.
